## LightModel.optionChanged() method

Notifies that the options has changed

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected optionChanged(changeHash: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  changeHash | boolean | true if the shader need to be rebuild |

**Returns:**

void
